During this 6 week hands on experience bootcamp, Bootcamp, I learned how to use AWS services tools regarding AI practices to be able to recognize images, classify documents, turn text to speech, create chatbots and process large data sets to comply with data quality needs to analyze it.Â 
Strategic Consulting Capstone-Â  Summer 2025 at University Canada West
Work as a consultant for FreeFuse in order to help them improve their potential customer/partner selection by applying a profile analysis to current customers/partners to analyse their performance and consumption to establish key profile aspects that help them search for potential clients/partners with a high turnover probability.Â Â

Kidzania Business Strategy Consulting-Â  Fall 2021 at ITESM
Create a new business plan for Grupo Kidzania along with along with strategies to attract new clients and improve the overall experience of current users, focusing on the user experience and kids learning and development of skills.Â

Appendix:
ğŸ§¾ MBA Portfolio â€“ One-Page Guide Use this as a template or structure for building a personal website, digital PDF, or LinkedIn-style portfolio. Focus on clarity, accessibility, and professional branding.
ğŸ‘¤ About Me / Bio What to include:
2â€“4 sentence professional summary
Your current MBA program and area of focus
Key professional interests (e.g., finance, marketing, tech strategy)
One line highlighting a career goal or personal value
Example:
Iâ€™m an MBA candidate at [Your University], passionate about leveraging data and strategy to drive innovation in the tech sector. With a background in [your past experience], I aim to bridge business insight with digital transformation.
ğŸ“ Education List your degrees in reverse chronological order:
Master of Business Administration (MBA) University Name â€“ City, Country Expected Graduation: [Month, Year]
Relevant courses or concentrations
Honors or scholarships (optional)
Previous Degree(s): Degree Title â€“ University Name â€“ Year
Optional: GPA (if strong), awards, or projects
ğŸ’¼ Professional Experience / Highlights Include 2â€“4 key roles or projects. For each, mention:
Title and company
Dates (month/year)
2â€“3 bullet points focused on impact, skills used, or results
Optional Sections:
Internships
Consulting projects
Volunteer leadership roles
Example: Marketing Intern â€“ ABC Corporation May 2024 â€“ Aug 2024
Developed a digital campaign strategy projected to increase traffic by 25%
Conducted competitor analysis and presented findings to senior leadership
ğŸ§  Key Skills & Strengths Group your skills into categories for easier reading:
Business Tools: Excel, Tableau, Power BI, SAP
Technical: SQL, Python (basic), Financial Modeling
Soft Skills: Leadership, Communication, Critical Thinking
Languages: English (fluent), Spanish (native), French (conversational)
ğŸ“‡ Contact & Links (Optional but recommended) Provide clear ways to reach you and link to your online presence:
ğŸ“§ Email: your.name@email.com

ğŸŒ Personal Website or Portfolio (if available)
ğŸ“ Location: City, Country (optional)
ğŸ–¼ Visual/Design Tips Whether youâ€™re creating a webpage, resume-style PDF, or Notion site:
Headshot or Logo (Optional): Top left or top right corner
Layout: 2-column split for Skills + Education or Experience + Bio
Colors: Use professional tones (navy, gray, white, earth tones)
Fonts: Clean, easy-to-read (e.g., Lato, Calibri, Roboto)
Spacing: Use whitespace to avoid clutter and guide the readerâ€™s eyeğŸ§¾ MBA Portfolio â€“ One-Page Guide
